    Software

    SVarp - Pangenome-based structural variant discovery

    gaftools - General purpose utility related to GAF files

    CONGA - Copy number variation genotyping in ancient genomes and low-coverage sequencing data

    TARDIS - Toolkit for Automated and Rapid DIscovery of Structural Variants

    VCFresolve - A tool that aims to sequence resolve VCF files
